    Data simulation and parameters recovery with brms

    Data simulation and parameters recovery with brms

    Data-simulation-and-parameter-recovery-with-brms.Rmd

    Baseline model

    Data simulation

    Formulas used for data simulation with lavaan::simulateData():

    #> std ~ 0.05 * SES + 0.05 * threat+ 0.05 * deprivation
#> internalizing ~ 0.05 * std + 0.1 * SES+ 0.015 * threat + -0.02 * deprivation
#> externalizing ~ 0.3 * std + 0.1 * SES+ 0.11 * threat + 0.04 * deprivation

    Histograms for the simulated dataset:

    Recovery of model parameters

    Mean estimates

    Estimated regression coefficients compared to the values used for the simulation.

    Posterior distributions

    Mediation model

    Data simulation

    Formulas used for data simulation with lavaan::simulateData():

    #> std ~ 0.05 * SES + 0.05 * threat+ 0.05 * deprivation
#> repro ~ 0.2 * std + 0.1 * SES+ 0.08 * threat + 0.03 * deprivation
#> internalizing ~ 0.05 * std + -0.02 * repro + 0.1 * SES + 0.015 * threat + -0.02 * deprivation
#> externalizing ~ 0.3 * std + 0.13 * repro + 0.1 * SES + 0.11 * threat + 0.04 * deprivation

    Histograms for the simulated dataset:

    Recovery of model parameters

    Posterior distributions

    Moderation model

    Data simulation

    Formulas used for data simulation with lavaan::simulateData():

    #> std ~ 0.05 * SES + 0.05 * threat+ 0.05 * deprivation
#> repro ~ 0.1 * SES + 0.08 * threat+ 0.03 * deprivation
#> internalizing ~ 0.05 * std + -0.02 * repro + 0.008 * prod_std_repro + 0.1 * SES + 0.015 * threat + -0.02 * deprivation
#> externalizing ~ 0.3 * std + 0.13 * repro + 0.1 * prod_std_repro + 0.1 * SES + 0.11 * threat + 0.04 * deprivation

    Histograms for the simulated dataset:

    Recovery of model parameters
